LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.ClickToExpandCol: Click to {0} the log entry's details
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.JobDoesNotExist: Can't go to job because job no longer exists
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.SelectToFilterLo: Select this job to filter logs only for this job. Select the already selected job to unselect.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.JobSettings.Show: Show logs with no work done
With this setting disabled, manager jobs that had no work to be done will have their logs hidden. These logs are often saying little more than "{0}" and may have low utility.
LanguageData.ColonyManagerRedux.Logs.JobSettings.Keep: Keep {0} of most the recent logs

The larger this number, the more memory these logs will use, and the more space they will use in the save file.\n\nThis value is only updated when starting a new game or when loading an existing game. Modifying this value will not immediately change an ongoing game's log retention count setting.
